Utility
An unofficial Flatpak port of Munadi - Simple Athan App.
Follow the upstream project at https://gitlab.com/munadi/munadi for more information.
Features:
Prayer times for almost any city
Light and free from advertisements
Choose your own downloaded Athan file
Enable, mute or adjust individual Athans
A number of different calculation methods
Keywords: Athan, Azan, Adhan, Prayer, Time, Salah, Salat, Namaz, Muslim, Islamic, Hijri

Back again with some long awaited and nice features!
New theme with time-of-the-day wallpapers!
System theme integration
Prayer-time window opacity adjustment
Background blur adjustment
24-Hour time format
Time offset adjustments from -30 to +60 minutes
Ability to choose separate custom adhan for each prayer
Show either Hijri, Gregorian or both dates
Hijri date offset adjustments
Better keyboard navigation
Fixed bugs
Slimmed code base
Special thanks to Hasan Esa [https://gitlab.com/HasanEsa] for the contributions and motivation, more will follow as a result inshallah.
Ramadan Kareem, some gifts:
Dark mode!
Major UI changes
Better tray UI and usability
Flatpak integration (autostart, background and hidden autostart)
This release contains a number of fixes and a new features:
Option to hide window when closed (run in background)
Reworked alarm code, it now detects sleeps and changes to time
Flag as ready for mobile Linux, e.g. Phoc, Plasma Mobile
Fix broken progress bar/time left
This release contains a large number of changes:
UI enhancement
Reworked alarm code
Upgraded Adhan.js lib to v3
Restored Android support (coming soon)
Fixed bug with no sound under Ubuntu
Restored ability to navigate to previous or next day (scroll over or click the date)
This release fixes some bugs:
Prayer times are now correct for countries with n.5 hours offset from UTC
Everything, including date and time, are now localised correctly
Hijir is disabled temporarily due to not being localised
This release adds tray icon support:
Click (or double click) the tray icon to hide/show Munadi
Right click the tray icon for context menu
Clicking on "time left" will stop currently playing Athan
Note: Not all desktop environments support tray icons or behave consistently!
This release fixes some minor RTL issues and provides Snap improvements:
Behind the scene improvements to RTL
Enabled perviously disabled window switching using dragging
Switched to core20 and cmake, which means supporting Snap going forward is possible
This release adds some requested features:
Added support for RTL languages
Added Arabic translation, thanks to Damascene
Some other minor enhancements
This release adds some requested features:
Added more calculation methods
Ability to add custom Athans
Note: Flatpak is now the preferred packaging method, this might be the last Snap release
This is a minor release, mainly adding support for Snap packaging:
Removed about page and merged it with settings page
Added support for Snap
Minor UI changes
This release added requested features made by many of you, some features were removed, and of course some UI enhancements:
Removed: Date can now go forward and backwards
Athan volumes can be configured individually
Added support for Android and Flatpak
UI enhancements
This release added requested features made by many of you, some features were removed, and of course some UI enhancements:
Brand new UI, using the latest and greatest from Qt
You can now toggle between Hijri date and Miladi
Mundadi will use system's proxy by default
Munadi is now almost three times lighter!
Date can now go forward and backwards
Removed Iqama functionality, sorry!
Added keyboard shortcuts, see help
Many issues fixed
There are many exciting changes in this release, including changes to the user interface, functionality, speed and many more, see below:
Iqama Time (Experimental):
Get Iqama time from any Mosque
Add Mosques to your favourite
Add Mosques to Munadi's datase
Add monthly timetable to any Mosque
Edit Mosque's details
Edit Mosque's timetable
Note: Please be responsible, we can't validate every Mosque out there
User Interface:
Added animation
Changed font and colour
Everything should be speedier
Other changes:
Integrated help
Automatically detect DST
New calculation methods
You now search for your city instead of menu selection
Many other changes behind the scenes
